title: Street Fighter IV: Aratanaru Kizuna

synonyms: Street Fighter IV: Arata naru Kizuna
alternative_titles.en: Street Fighter IV: The Ties That Bind
alternative_titles.ja: ストリートファイターIV 新たなる絆

synopsis: An animated prequel to the video-game Street Fighter IV. Set after the events of Street Fighter II, the film follows Ryu and his allies as they discover a conspiracy to kidnap powerful fighters from around the world and use them to create deadly biological weapons.
